hotels.vendor_name: Le Royal Hotel Lyon - MGallery Collection
hotels.title: Heritage Lyon Stay Overlooking Place Bellecour with Onsite Restaurant & Cooking School
hotels.description: Step into a world of Lyonnais charm and Belle Époque grandeur at this historic property, the only five-star hotel in Bellacour Square. Nestled in the Presqu'île district, Le Royal Lyon MGallery showcases period details alongside contemporary comforts. Unwind in cosy rooms with plush bedding and marble bathrooms, then savour authentic cuisine at L'Institut restaurant, where chefs creates magic with local ingredients. Fancy learning a trick or two? The first-floor Ecole de Cuisine offers lessons in pastry, baking, mixology, general cooking and more. Just steps from Place Bellecour and the River Rhône, this hotel puts Lyon's treasures at your fingertips. Wander cobblestone streets to discover hidden bouchons, browse luxury boutiques, or explore the magnificent Basilica Notre-Dame de Fourvière. After a day immersed in Lyon's culinary scene and rich history, return to the elegant Cote Bellecour bar for a perfectly crafted cocktail.

hotels.title: Romantic Lyon Escape Overlooking the Rhone River
hotels.description: Blending contemporary design with historic charm, the InterContinental Lyon - Hotel Dieu, an IHG Hotel, offers stunning views of manicured courtyards and the Rhone River. Immerse yourself in the gorgeous architecture and history of Lyon, before enjoying modern French cuisine at onsite Epona or heading out to sample the many delights of this capital of gastronomy. As the sun sets, take a moment over a glass of wine at the intimate Le Dome bar, or drink in the stunning scenery from a cosy room or suite.

hotels.title: Glamorous Lyon Stay near Place de la République with Onsite Cocktail Bar & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the timeless elegance of Lyon with a stylish stay at this exquisite hotel, located within a UNESCO World Heritage-listed district. This historic hotel is a stone's throw from the city's finest attractions, including the majestic Basilica of Notre-Dame de Fourvière, the ancient Roman Theatre of Fourvière and the vibrant Rue Mercière, known for its exceptional dining scene. The hotel's location on the Presqu'île peninsula offers guests easy access to the city's two rivers, the Rhône and the Saône, putting Lyon's treasures at your fingertips. Wander cobblestoned streets to discover hidden bouchons and browse luxury boutiques before returning to your city oasis for a craft cockatil at Le Bar du Carlton or a treatment at CODAGE Spa.

hotels.title: Elegant Lyon Escape Overlooking the Idyllic Parc de la Tete d'Or
hotels.description: Blending charming architecture with modern conveniences, Crowne Plaza Lyon - Cite Internationale, an IHG Hotel offers stunning views over the manicured gardens of Parc de la Tete d'Or. After days strolling the cobbled streets of the charming Old Town, immerse yourself in modern French cuisine at the onsite Bistrot Rive Gauche, or head out to sample the many delights of this epicurean city, known as the French capital of gastronomy.

hotels.title: Riverside Sofitel Lyon Luxury Overlooking Place Bellecour with Panoramic Rooftop Restaurant & Day Spa
hotels.description: Perfectly positioned on the banks of the Rhône River, this five-star sanctuary places you at the heart of Lyon’s UNESCO-listed Presqu’île district. Stroll to the cobbled streets of Vieux Lyon, where Renaissance architecture and bouchons await, or wander to the vibrant Place Bellecour, just steps away, for boutique shopping and art galleries. Savour refined French gastronomy at the panoramic Les 3 Dômes restaurant overlooking the city’s rooftops or indulge in a craft cocktail at one of the two onsite bars. After exploring the Musée des Beaux-Arts or the lively Les Halles de Lyon Paul Bocuse, retreat to the acclaimed Sofitel Spa before settling into your elegantly appointed room.
